attributes.action: Calculate household income with tax for Education Maintenance Allowance  (EMA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello,

Education Maintenance Allowance (EMA) gives students up to £30 per week for carrying on with further education.

But the money is depended on house hold income Education Maintenance Allowance should calculate house hold income with tax.

They should also do more security checks because some parents get away with getting Education Maintenance Allowance even tough there income tax is more then 30k

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
